column1: Sources: Ministry of Finance; and Fund staff estimates and projections.
1/ Fiscal year is from April to March.
2/ Insurance companies and other non bank private sector; BOSS programs are also included here.
3/ Including government's equity investment into crisis-affected companies in the tourism sector.
4/ Including: Central Government debt, Central Government expenditure and debt arrears (if any), and SOE debt guaranteed by the Central
Government including IMF loan to the CBB; it excludes debt directly serviced by SOEs and not guaranteed by the CG.
